name: Elephant room

exits.description: You can't find an exit this direction.
You go this direction but it runs into a wall. Oops.
You see more elephants but you can't go this direction.
There is a fat elephant over here but you can't go this direction.
There are several tiny elephants over here made of glass but nothing else. You can't go this direction.
More elephants but you can't go this direction.
Even more elephants but you can't go this direction.
The giant elephant is above you but you can't go this direction.
The pile of magic stuff is below you.

problemDescription: Solve this problemt to find the secret passageway.
description: Everywhere you look you see elephants. Glass elephants decorated in every color, plastic elephants of all shapes and sizes, and in the middle of the room you see a huge elephant statue.  Underneth the back of the elephant there is a pile of something.  You go closer and the pile is sparkling and you realize that this stuff must be magic.  So you grab a handfull of the magic stuff and put it in your pocket. You look around to find a way out of this room but you see nothing.  Perhaps if you solve a problem you will be able to escape this room.
